description: There's nothing like cosying up with a bowl of warm chicken soup. This easy, veggie-packed chicken soup recipe is the perfect weeknight comfort food meal.
keywords: Chicken soup,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Simple Chicken Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Cook celery, carrot and onion, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes or until softened and lightly browned. Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add stock and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until soup has reduced slightly.
Add chicken and cook, covered, for 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Season and serve.
